dao.name: QRY_RVRMCOD_RF
dao.statement: select * from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)
and room_typ in(:room_typ)
and rent_cod in(:rent_cod)
and serv_cod in(:serv_cod)
and free_cod in(:free_cod)

dao.name: QRY_SINGLE_RVRMCOD_RF
dao.statement: select * from rvrmcod_rf rvrm where rvrm.athena_id = :athena_id and rvrm.begin_dat = to_date(:begin_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') and trim(rvrm.room_cod) = trim(:room_cod) and trim(rvrm.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: CHK_EDIT_RVEMCOD_RF_DAT
dao.statement: SELECT val_nam as belong_dat FROM COMP_SVAL_MN WHERE TRIM(VAL_RMK) = 'rent_cal_dat' AND SYS_COD = 'HFD' AND athena_id = :athena_id

dao.name: QRY_RVRMCOD_RF_OLD_ROOM_COD
dao.statement: select room_nam,room_sna,room_typ from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod) and rownum = 1

root.dao:
select count(*) as room_count from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod)
athena_id hotel_cod room_cod <parameter type="string" kind="2" condition="begin_dat <> to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')">begin_dat begin_dat

dao.name: CHK_RVRMCOD_RF_IS_EXIST_RMINV_DT
dao.statement: select count(*) as room_count from rminv_dt where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod) and rownum = 1

dao.name: CHK_RVRMCOD_RF_IS_COVER_BEGIN_END_DAT
dao.statement: SELECT count(*) AS cover_count FROM RVRMCOD_RF WHERE athena_id = :athena_id AND trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) AND trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod) AND BEGIN_DAT <> :old_begin_dat AND BEGIN_DAT <= :begin_dat and END_DAT >= :end_dat

dao.name: CHK_RVRMCOD_RF_IS_EXIST
dao.statement: SELECT count(*) AS cover_count FROM rvrmcod_rf WHERE room_cod = :room_cod AND ( BEGIN_DAT BETWEEN to_date(:begin_dat,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND to_date(:end_dat,'YYYY/MM/DD') OR END_DAT BETWEEN to_date(:begin_dat,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND to_date(:end_dat,'YYYY/MM/DD') )

dao.name: CHK_GUEST_GRP_RF_IS_EXIST_RVRMCOD_RF
dao.statement: select count(*) as room_count from rvrmcod_rf where trim(athena_id) = trim(:athena_id) and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_typ) = trim(:room_typ)

dao.name: QRY_HFD_REST_MN_ROOM_COD
dao.statement: select distinct room_cod as value, room_sna as display from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and end_dat >= :rent_cal_dat

dao.name: CHK_RVRMCOD_RF_ROOM_TYP
dao.statement: select room_typ from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod) and begin_dat <> to_date(:begin_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD')

dao.name: QRY_RMINV_MN_MAX_BATCH_DAT
dao.statement: SELECT MAX(BATCH_DAT) as max_batch_dat FROM RMINV_MN WHERE athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_ROOM_COD
dao.statement: select room_cod as value, room_nam as display from rvrmcod_rf where trim(athena_id) = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = ?

dao.name: QRY_RVRMCOD_RF_ROOM_NAM
dao.statement: select room_nam from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod) and begin_dat <> to_date(:begin_dat,'YYYY/MM/DD') and rownum = 1

dao.name: QRY_RVRMCOD_RF_ROOM_SNA
dao.statement: select room_sna from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod) and begin_dat <> to_date(:begin_dat,'YYYY/MM/DD') and rownum = 1

dao.name: QRY_RVRMCOD_RF_FOR_RATECOD
dao.statement: select UNIQUE ROOM_COD,ROOM_NAM,ROOM_SNA from RVRMCOD_RF WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(:hotel_cod) AND END_DAT > = to_date(:rent_cal_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD')

dao.name: SEL_RVRMCOD_RF
dao.statement: select distinct a.room_cod value, a.room_sna display,b.view_seq from rvrmcod_rf a join room_cod_order b on a.athena_id =b.athena_id and a.hotel_cod = b.hotel_cod and a.room_cod = b.room_cod where a.athena_id = :athena_id and a.hotel_cod = :hotel_cod and a.end_dat >= to_date(pg_ais2.sf_get_hotel_sval(:hotel_cod,'HFD','rent_cal_dat', :athena_id),'YYYY/MM/DD') order by b.view_seq, a.room_cod
